013package org.apache.juneau.junit.bct;
014
015import java.util.function.*;
016
017/**
018 * Functional interface for pre-processing and transforming objects before conversion.
019 *
020 * <p>Swappers provide object transformation logic that runs before stringification or
021 * listification. They enable unwrapping, preprocessing, and value extraction from
022 * wrapper objects, containers, and lazy evaluation constructs.</p>
023 *
024 * <h5 class='section'>Key Features:</h5>
025 * <ul>
026 *    <li><b>Pre-processing:</b> Transform objects before string/list conversion</li>
027 *    <li><b>Wrapper unwrapping:</b> Extract values from Optional, Supplier, Future, etc.</li>
028 *    <li><b>Lazy evaluation:</b> Trigger computation of lazy values</li>
029 *    <li><b>Type transformation:</b> Convert between related types for better testing</li>
030 * </ul>
031 *
032 * <h5 class='section'>Common Use Cases:</h5>
033 * <ul>
034 *    <li><b>Optional unwrapping:</b> Extract values from Optional containers</li>
035 *    <li><b>Supplier evaluation:</b> Call get() on Supplier objects</li>
036 *    <li><b>Future resolution:</b> Extract completed values from Future objects</li>
037 *    <li><b>Proxy unwrapping:</b> Extract underlying objects from proxies</li>
038 *    <li><b>Value extraction:</b> Pull relevant data from complex wrapper objects</li>
039 * </ul>
040 *
041 * <h5 class='section'>Usage Examples:</h5>
042 * <p class='bjava'>
043 *    <jc>// Future value extraction</jc>
044 *    Swapper&lt;CompletableFuture&gt; <jv>futureSwapper</jv> = (<jp>conv</jp>, <jp>future</jp>) -&gt; {
045 *       <jk>try</jk> {
046 *          <jk>return</jk> <jp>future</jp>.isDone() ? <jp>future</jp>.get() : <js>"&lt;pending&gt;"</js>;
047 *       } <jk>catch</jk> (Exception <jv>e</jv>) {
048 *          <jk>return</jk> <js>"&lt;error: "</js> + <jv>e</jv>.getMessage() + <js>"&gt;"</js>;
049 *       }
050 *    };
051 *
052 *    <jc>// Custom wrapper unwrapping</jc>
053 *    Swapper&lt;LazyValue&gt; <jv>lazySwapper</jv> = (<jp>conv</jp>, <jp>lazy</jp>) -&gt;
054 *       <jp>lazy</jp>.isEvaluated() ? <jp>lazy</jp>.getValue() : <js>"&lt;unevaluated&gt;"</js>;
055 *
056 *    <jc>// Entity to DTO conversion</jc>
057 *    Swapper&lt;UserEntity&gt; <jv>entitySwapper</jv> = (<jp>conv</jp>, <jp>entity</jp>) -&gt;
058 *       <jk>new</jk> UserDTO(<jp>entity</jp>.getId(), <jp>entity</jp>.getName(), <jp>entity</jp>.getEmail());
059 * </p>
060 *
061 * <h5 class='section'>Registration:</h5>
062 * <p class='bjava'>
063 *    <jk>var</jk> <jv>converter</jv> = BasicBeanConverter.<jsm>builder</jsm>()
064 *       .defaultSettings()
065 *       .addSwapper(CompletableFuture.<jk>class</jk>, <jv>futureSwapper</jv>)
066 *       .addSwapper(LazyValue.<jk>class</jk>, <jv>lazySwapper</jv>)
067 *       .addSwapper(UserEntity.<jk>class</jk>, <jv>entitySwapper</jv>)
068 *       .build();
069 * </p>
070 *
071 * <h5 class='section'>Execution Flow:</h5>
072 * <p>Swappers are applied early in the conversion process:</p>
073 * <ol>
074 *    <li><b>Object received</b> for conversion</li>
075 *    <li><b>Swapper applied</b> if one is registered for the object's type</li>
076 *    <li><b>Result processed</b> through normal stringification/listification</li>
077 *    <li><b>Chain continues</b> recursively for nested objects</li>
078 * </ol>
079 *
080 * <h5 class='section'>Best Practices:</h5>
081 * <ul>
082 *    <li><b>Handle exceptions</b> gracefully, returning error indicators rather than throwing</li>
083 *    <li><b>Preserve semantics</b> - the swapped object should represent the same logical value</li>
084 *    <li><b>Consider performance</b> - swappers are called frequently during conversion</li>
085 *    <li><b>Return meaningful values</b> for null or invalid states</li>
086 *    <li><b>Avoid recursion</b> - ensure swappers don't create circular transformations that could 
087 *        lead to {@link StackOverflowError}. The framework does not detect recursion, so developers
088 *        must ensure swapped objects don't trigger the same or related swappers in an endless cycle</li>
089 * </ul>
090 *
091 * @param <T> The type of object this swapper handles
092 * @see BasicBeanConverter.Builder#addSwapper(Class, Swapper)
093 * @see BeanConverter#swap(Object)
094 */
095@FunctionalInterface
096public interface Swapper<T> extends BiFunction<BeanConverter,T,Object> {}
